body:
Theodore said it all. I just want to add two links here:



Here is a paper with a sample file: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/knowledge-s...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/knowledge-sharing-agent-based-geometry-optimization-for-tall)



and this one is a video that shows the process (using octopus):

<iframe _origwidth="560" frameborder="0" height="267" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6c32kZN19FU?wmode=opaque" width="475"></iframe>




If you search for optimization and ladybug you will find a couple of similar discussions.
